ComicInfo.Summary:
Hairbutt the Hippo stars an anthropomorphic hippopotamus named Hairbutt, who works as a private detective. This issue tells two tales of crime noir fiction "Waiting for The Man" and "As Crime Goes By". Brought to you by the decidedly-twisted good folks at Rat Race Comix comes the thundering saga of a Down Under private dick who does not go gently into that good night. You know him, you love him! Yes, it's HAIRBUTT THE HIPPO, he of the nasty temperament and even nastier personal grooming habits. Like one of the covers boasts, "Uncut! Uncensored! Unashamed! Unhygenic!"
